author: dildick
body:
Follow up of #20191 and #18560 and (hopefully) last major pull request in this series. 

In this PR:
* I changed the names of `CSCMotherboardME11GEM` and `CSCMotherboardME21GEM` to `CSCGEMMotherboardME11` and `CSCGEMMotherboardME21` respectively, which now derive from `CSCGEMMotherboard`. 
* `CSCMotherboardME3141RPC` was removed.
* LUTs are all filled in. Might need to be updated in the future as GE2/1 geometry gets fine-tuned.
* option to run on `GEMPadDigiClusters` is introduced
* usage of `CSCTriggerGeometry` is completely removed in the CSC trigger. Instead, the ALCT/CLCT processor now use the `CSCGeometry`. `CSCTriggerGeometry` is still used in various places in CMSSW (e.g. CSCTF, DQM).
* `CSCTriggerPrimitivesBuilder` is a local `unique_ptr` of the `CSCTriggerPrimitivesProducer`
* some functions in `CSCMotherBoard` have been made `const` 
* `GEMCoPadProcessor` has functionality to create copads out of two pads in different rolls. parameters for GE11 and GE21 are in separate psets now
* This PR should only affect Phase-2 workflows

@tahuang1991 please check
title: GEM-CSC local trigger: make ME11 and ME21 TMBs inherit from same base class
